Instruction: 'Follow steps 1 and 2 from the classic hash browns recipe to prepare the potatoes.'
'Transfer the grated potatoes to a bowl and season with salt and black pepper.'
'Mix in the shredded cheddar cheese and chopped green onions with the grated potatoes.'
In a large skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.'
Add the potato mixture to the skillet, pressing it down evenly with a spatula.'
Cook the hash browns for about 5-7 minutes on each side, or until golden brown and crispy.'
Once cooked, transfer the hash browns to a plate.'
'Serve hot and enjoy these delicious cheesy hash browns!'
